Create 5' UTR features.

Source: R/features.r
create_utrs5.Rd

Create 5' UTR features.

Usage

create_utrs5(x)

Arguments

x

ivl_df in BED12 format

See also

Other feature functions: create_introns(), create_tss(), create_utrs3()

Examples

x <- read_bed12(valr_example("mm9.refGene.bed.gz"))

create_utrs5(x)
